SEARCH
Package entity.registration

Class Registration

Object
Registration
public class Registration extends Object
Represents a registration request from an Officer to handle a BTO project. Stores information about the officer making the request, the target project, registration date, and the current status (PENDING, APPROVED, or REJECTED). Registration objects are created when officers express interest in managing a project and must be approved by a manager before the officer is assigned.

  • Constructor Details

    • Registration

      public Registration(int id, Officer officer, String projectName, LocalDate registrationDate, RegistrationStatus status)
      Constructs a new Registration with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this registration
      officer - The officer registering for the project
      projectName - The name of the project being registered for
      registrationDate - The date when the registration was submitted
      status - The initial status of the registration (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED)

    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration()
      Updates the registration status to APPROVED. Called when a manager approves this registration.

    • rejectRegistration

      public void rejectRegistration()
      Updates the registration status to REJECTED. Called when a manager rejects this registration.
